nodes.text: The Silencer was a Resurgent-class Star Destroyer in service to the navy of the First Order that was sent along with Captain Phasma to patrol a hyperspace transit point between the Unknown Regions and the Core Worlds.

The Silencer served in the navy of the First Order, and sometime between 28 ABY and 34 ABY, the Silencer was dispatched to patrol a hyperspace transit point between the Unknown Regions and the Core Worlds. The Silencer was led by Captain Phasma, who hoped to encounter spies working for the Resistance who may have been seeking to infiltrate the Unknown Regions and scouting the remnants of the old Galactic Empire. Captain Phasma and the Silencer were ordered to intercept any small or suspicious starships that could be used by Resistance scouts.
